name: Minigame Pile
description:
A collection of minigames made by members of Open Game Dev for its first project: Minigame Pile! Have a minigame idea you wish was in this collection? Make it! Anyone can create for Open Game Dev. Check out a few of the places we do our work for ideas on how to get started:

Discord server
Trello (project management tool)
GitHubGitHub (project source code)
